## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCHX7, CHX7</u>
- **Gene Name:** CATION/H+ EXCHANGER 7
- **Description:**   Cation/hydrogen exchanger family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
